title: Biotech Virtual Lab: Inquiry-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational life science knowledge, understanding of basic molecular biology concepts
context.additional_context: Environment where face-to-face experiments are challenging due to pandemic restrictions. Requires smartphone-based access. Inquiry-based learning centered on real-life application cases

learning_goals: They can explain PCR experimental procedures step-by-step using virtual laboratory simulations.
Through inquiry-based learning activities, they connect DNA replication mechanisms with biotechnology applications.
By applying scaffolding strategies, they systematically analyze complex molecular biology concepts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
